hs_codes.description: HS Code is an international standardized system of names and numbers for classifying traded products.
hs_codes.format: 6-digit basic code with 2-4 additional digits depending on country

examples.870323: Passenger cars with engine capacity over 1500cc but not exceeding 3000cc

incoterms.EXW: Ex Works - The seller makes the goods available at their premises.
incoterms.FOB: Free on Board - The seller loads the goods on board the vessel nominated by the buyer.
incoterms.CIF: Cost, Insurance and Freight - Seller arranges and pays for transport and insurance to the named port of destination.
incoterms.DDP: Delivered Duty Paid - Seller is responsible for delivering the goods to the named place in the country of importation.
